actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require principal campaign committees to pay the same rate of tax as other political organizations.
short_title: Political Organization Tax Equity Act of 1989

summary.text: Political Organization Tax Equity Act of 1989 - Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code that tax the principal campaign committee of a congressional candidate under special rules, thereby taxing such committees as other political organizations are taxed.

titles.title: Political Organization Tax Equity Act of 1989
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require principal campaign committees to pay the same rate of tax as other political organizations.
